title: Classroom Research Simulation Training for Job-Based Mathematical Knowledge Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and workplace training experience
context.additional_context: VR-based recreation of real classroom scenarios to experience lesson design and execution processes, applying team-based collaboration and immediate feedback systems

learning_goals: Through VR simulations, apply and explain three task selection and representation methods (visual/mathematical) during lesson design phases
Identify at least two learner misconception cases during instruction and propose correction strategies
Analyze the degree of professional growth in teaching fractional measurement concepts through peer and self-evaluation of reflective journaling
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
